summary: This is an FBI electronic communication summarizing an interview conducted on January 10, 2007, with an individual regarding the federal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's sexual exploitation of minors. The interviewee describes his role as a driver/recruiter for Epstein, transporting females to Epstein's residence for massages, and provides details about payments, recruitment methods, and other associates.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the federal investigation for sexual exploitation of minors. The interviewee worked for him, transporting females to his residence for massages.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who would call the interviewee to request he pick up specific girls and bring them to Epstein's residence. The interviewee initially believed she was Epstein's wife.

persons.name: Unknown Interviewee
persons.context: The individual being interviewed. He was Epstein's driver/recruiter, transporting females to Epstein's Palm Beach residence for massages in exchange for $200 payments. He also recruited females from malls, clubs, and schools.

persons.name: Unknown Girlfriend
persons.role: Girlfriend of Interviewee, Associate of Epstein
persons.context: The interviewee's girlfriend, who introduced him to Jeffrey Epstein. She was Epstein's personal assistant, provided him massages, and recruited other females to do the same. She traveled frequently with Epstein.

persons.name: Unknown Chef
persons.context: Described by the interviewee as a Spanish man with dark hair who worked as a chef at Epstein's residence.

persons.name: Unknown Recruited Female 1
persons.context: A female recruited by the interviewee and his girlfriend to work for Epstein. Epstein later paid for her to attend a massage school in Thailand, from which she did not return.

persons.name: Unknown Recruited Female 2
persons.context: Another female who attended Royal Palm Beach High School and was recruited to work for Epstein.

connections.description: The interviewee was paid by Epstein to drive and recruit females to Epstein's residence for massages.
They were in a romantic relationship. She introduced him to Epstein and they recruited females together.
She was Epstein's personal assistant, provided him massages, and recruited other females for him. She also traveled with him frequently.
Maxwell would call the interviewee to direct the pickup of specific girls for Epstein. The interviewee initially believed she was Epstein's wife.
Maxwell would contact the interviewee to instruct him to pick up and transport specific girls to Epstein's residence.
The interviewee and his girlfriend recruited this female to work for Epstein. Epstein later sent her to Thailand for massage training.

events.title: FBI Interview of Witness
events.description: The FBI interviewed an individual in West Palm Beach, Florida, regarding the federal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's sexual exploitation of minors.

events.title: Recruitment and Transport of Females
events.description: Ongoing activity where the interviewee transported females, recruited from malls, clubs, and schools, to Epstein's Palm Beach residence for massages, for which he was paid $200.

events.title: Trip to Thailand for Recruited Female
events.description: Epstein paid for a recruited female to travel to Thailand to attend a school specializing in massages. She did not return, and the interviewee was left with her dog and a large phone bill.

events.title: Argument Over Non-Returning Female
events.description: The interviewee and Epstein argued about the female who did not return from Thailand. Epstein told the interviewee to ensure future females he brought were eighteen.

locations: Hidden Harbor (apartment complex in Palm Beach, North of Okeechobee Boulevard)
Epstein's residence (Palm Beach, location unspecified in this excerpt)
keyFacts: The interviewee was paid $200 by Jeffrey Epstein for each female he drove or brought to Epstein's residence for massages.
Females were recruited from locations like malls, clubs, and schools. Ghislaine Maxwell would also call to request specific girls be picked up.
Epstein paid for at least one recruited female to travel to Thailand for massage training; she did not return, leaving the interviewee with financial liabilities.
The interviewee's girlfriend was Epstein's personal assistant, provided him massages, and recruited other females, suggesting a structured operation.
Epstein instructed the interviewee to ensure the females he brought were eighteen years old.
